multiLanguageSupportDescription: Switch between English and Nepali for a localized experience.
notificationPermissionRequired: Notification permission is required to receive reminders. Please enable it in your device settings.
disableNotificationsConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable notifications? You won't receive reminders for plant care.
enableNotificationsConfirm: Enable notifications to receive reminders for plant care.
cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera access in settings.
galleryPermissionDenied: Gallery permission denied. Please enable gallery access in settings.
noReminders:
No reminders yet.
Tap the + button to add one.
title: Title
deleteReminderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
helpSupportDescription: Get help with using the Plant Disease Detection app. Find answers to common questions and learn how to make the most of our AI-powered features.
takingPhotosDescription: Tap the camera button to take a photo of a single leaf. For better accuracy, ensure the leaf is clearly visible, well-lit, and isolated from other leaves.
diseaseDetectionDescription: Our AI will analyze the photo and identify potential diseases. Results include confidence levels and treatment recommendations.
settingRemindersDescription: Set up reminders for plant care tasks. You can schedule daily, weekly, or custom reminders for watering, fertilizing, and disease checks.
poorPhotoQualityDescription: Ensure good lighting and focus on the affected area. Clean the camera lens and hold the device steady.
appNotRespondingDescription: Restart the app or your device. Make sure you have a stable internet connection for best results.
permissionIssuesDescription: Grant camera and notification permissions in your device settings for full app functionality.
aiDiseaseDetectionDescription: Upload plant photos to get instant disease identification with treatment recommendations.
plantCareRemindersDescription: Set personalized reminders for watering, fertilizing, and plant health checks.
treatmentDatabaseDescription: Access comprehensive treatment information for various plant diseases.
needMoreHelp: Need more help? Contact our support team:
